description:
2BR / 1Ba available oct 1 furnished house w/d in unit no smoking street parking/ 2br -ALL INCLUSIVE 2 Bedroom Apt Furnished - Main Subway Available OCT 1

AVAILABLE October 1, 2020 and EVERYTHING INCLUDED

Fully Furnished Two bedroom Basement Apartment. Ensuite laundry. Private Separate Entrance.

Located in trendy Danforth Village in East York on a quiet dead end street close to great restaurants, shops, parks, bike trails, schools, churches and public transport.

Ideal for International students, couples, and working holiday visas for long or short stays.

LGBT friendly

Only a 7 minute walk to Main Subway TTC and Danforth GO Train. (TTC commute to Yonge and Bloor is 20 minutes. Danforth GO commute to Union Station is 10 minutes).

Permit Street Parking easily available through the City of Toronto.

UTILITIES INCLUDED: heat, air conditioning, hydro, electric, water, laundry, and wireless hi - speed unlimited internet.

First and last month’s rent with References required.


VIEWINGS STARTING SEPT 1

CONTACT: Name, Phone, Email, Occupation and Duration of Occupancy to view. (Due to the large number of applicants only those selected will be contacted.)
title: ALL INCLUSIVE 2 bedroom Furnished -Main Subway, Available Oct 1

description:
2BR / 1Ba 950ft2 available oct 1 cats are OK - purrr dogs are OK - wooof apartment w/d in unit no smoking off-street parking/ 2br - 950ft2 -LUXURIOUS & SPACIOUS 2-BEDROOM UNIT IN THE SIXPLEX BUILDING!!!

PRIME LOCATION IN HUMBER BAY COMMUNITY!
Queensway – Park Lawn Road (NEAR HIGH PARK!!!)

NEWLY RENOVATED light, bright & spacious, OPEN CONCEPT 2-BEDROOM UNIT in a very quiet family neighbourhood. MUST BE SEEN!!!!

FEATURES:

➢ Very Bright Spacious living and dining area
➢ Large open concept new eat-in kitchen with countertop peninsula (dishwasher, fridge & stove)
➢ 2 spacious bedrooms
➢ Complete 4 piece bathroom (with tub & shower)
➢ Private In-suite laundry (washer & dryer)
➢ Private balcony
➢ Ductless A/C
➢ Onsite parking space available


PRICE: $2,100.00 (+ hydro)

Don’t miss out on this opportunity!

LOCATION:

Easy access to Gardiner, 427, QEW, 10 minutes car ride to downtown. TTC accessible (steps to bus stop)
Walking distance to many Parks, Schools, and Libraries.
Beautiful walks along Lakeshore waterfront, Humber River, High Park. Great area for cycling.
Close to Bloor West Village with many restaurants, stores and banks.
Steps to SOBEYS and METRO grocery stores, SHOPPERS DRUG MART and shopping plaza with walk-in medical clinic.


TTC TRANSPORTATION:

Accessible from the Bloor –Danforth subway by 3 bus routes:
Route 66A or 66B buses from Old Mill station. Ride time approximately 10 minutes.
Route 80 bus from Keele station. Ride time approximately 10 minutes.
title: GORGEOUS RENOVATED-2 BEDROOM UNIT- QUEENSWAY & PARKLAWN!!!

description:
available sep 25 apartment w/d in unit A beautiful 2 bedroom Basement apartment . At Richmond hill area - Bayview and Elgin Mills

There are windows in every room. Free access to the backyard. Separate Entrance, Kitchen, Shower room and parking.
A huge living room, laundry and Wi-Fi.

The TTC is just around the Corner.

Available from October 1st or earlier.

The entire place is $1,300/ per month Plus some utilities

It is also available to rent by the rooms : $750 - $850 per month for each room

Please contact by the e-mail for more details and to book the showing.

Students are also welcome
title: Basement Apartment
